edge: The student protest outside the store turns into the Corpus Christi massacre of 10 June 1971.
Fermín appears as one of Los Halcones during the Corpus Christi massacre.
Fermín points a gun at Cleo and Teresa before wordlessly exiting.
Antonio briefly appears, reassures her, then makes an excuse to leave.
Sofía tells her children that she and their father are separating and that the holiday is giving him time to collect his belongings from their home.
Cleo wades in and saves Sofi and Paco from a strong current at the beach.
Cleo confesses that she did not want her baby to be born.
The group returns home to find the house reorganized.
